hints.content:
[[☃ image 1]]

If no deliveries were paid, the cash register would have $120+56=176$ dollars at the end of the day.

options.alt: A rectangle divided into two unequal parts. The first part is bigger than the second part. The first part is labeled Not spent and has a curved bracket across the bottom labeled 141. The second part is labeled Spent and has a curved bracket across the bottom labeled with a question mark. A curved bracket below the entire rectangle is labeled 120 plus 56. !

hints.content: The cost of the delivery was $\$\pink{35}$.

question.content:
The cash register at the ice cream store started the day with $\$120$. During the day, the store earned $\$56$ selling ice cream.  The manager also paid for a delivery out of the cash register. At the end of the day, the cash register had $\$141$.  
 
**How much did the delivery cost?**  

$\$$ [[☃ input-number 1]]
